opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: In Re Disbarment of Days. No. D-1332

opinion:
510 U.S. 987

In re Disbarment of Days.
No. D-1332.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 29, 1993.

1

It is ordered that John Wesley Days, of Silver Spring, Md., be suspended from the practice of law in this Court and that a rule issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
